String.name: LOGGER_TEST
String.description: The logger will print the value of this variable when it is set.

Integer.name: LOGGER_TEST_INTEGER
Integer.description: This is only used to test logger replace function #i0#

Boolean.name: LOGGER_TEST_BOOLEAN
Boolean.description: This is only used to test logger replace function #b0#

Float64.name: LOGGER_TEST_DERIVATIVE
Float64.description: This is to test that the derivative attribute may appear on any Float64 variables.

Float64.name: LOGGER_TEST_DERIVATIVE_DER
Float64.description: This is to test that the derivative attribute may appear on any Float64 variables.
